titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Office of the sheriff of Marion County, Indiana.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 5/19/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to transfer to the office of the Sheriff of Marion County, Indiana, for drug enforcement and prisoner transportation purposes a specified type of aircraft forfeited to the United States under the customs laws.
